page.title: 05My Hobby,Triathlon
page.content: {TRIATHLON My hobby is taking part in{TRIATHLON events.In a triathlon there are three events; Swimming,Running and Shooting. The swimming is 100 yds or 100m (depending on the size of the pool). The shooting is 10 shots and you have got to score 100 from a distance of 10m with an air pistol. In the run you have got to run as fast as you can for a distance of 1000 metres across country.In a triathlon there are different age groups 8-10, 11-13, 14-16,17-18,19-25, and over 25. First of all you do the run and the first boy goes and then, 30 seconds later, the first girl goes,and so on.Then you do the shoot. You have five practice shots and then you have ten scoring shots.By the time you finish the shoot the score for the run is put up.
